name: userbot
description: A simple telegram userbot made using pyrogram asyncio.

API_ID.description: Get your telegram API ID from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get your telegram API HASH from https://my.telegram.org

HU_STRING_SESSION.description: Clone the repository locally first. Change directory to userbot. Generate your string session by running "python3 GenerateStringSession.py"
